intro.description: Test that when a scope is applied all functions work correctly

item.title: Create compound filter
item.description: Create a filter based on more than one condition

subitem.label: Click on the scope link next to the search typein, a dialog called "Select Scope" should open.
In the select scope dialog press "New...". A dialog named New Scope should be opened. Enter "tk" as the name of the new criteria set (choose a different name if tk already in use) be opened
Expand Title contains the letter. Check letter k and letter t.
Check the checkbox for the topic User Assistance tests
Hit the OK button to dismiss the dialog and hit the OK button again to dismiss the Select Scope dialog

item.title: Topics showing in toc
item.description: Verify that only one book shows: User Assistance Tests

item.title: Filtering of Tree
item.description: Expand User Assistance Tests/Test for criteria. Verify that it has only two chilrdren: Page k and Page t

item.title: Search
item.description: Search for runtime. Verify that there are two hits, Page t and Page k.

item.title: Print selected topic
item.description: Select User Assistance Tests/Test for criteria and press Print Selected Topics and all Subtopics. Verify that only Criteria page 'k' and Criteria page 't' are printed

item.title: Search selected topic
item.description: Test that search selected topic is scoped

subitem.label: Select User Assistance Tests/Test for criteria and press Search Selected Topics and all Subtopics. Verify that a dialog opens.
In the dialog enter the word "searchable" and hit OK
Verify that there are two hits, Page t and Page k.

item.title: Breadcrumbs and show in TOC
item.description: Test Breadcrumbs and show in TOC

subitem.label: Open Page k from the search results, verify that the breadcrumb is correct.
Press the Show in Table of Contents button. Verify that the correct page is selecetd in the table fo contents.
